info.title: Real Estate Usage Enablement Type
info.description: The service allows users to read the Real Estate Usage Enablement Type separately. Create, Update and Delete operations are not supported for this service. It focuses solely on additional read functionalities.

x-sap-shortText: Read Real Estate Usage Enablement Type using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Real Estate Master Data Integration(SAP_COM_0697)
